invocations.description: Iterates through a database section. The values are stored in the variable v, they have the properties .name and .value. You must specify the section name in the parameter sectionName. For more information about databases, visit this
invocations.ex:
foreach $chardb:sectionvalue v 'killCount' do
	print(v.name, v.value)
end
invocations.exDescription: Will iterate through all the items in section 'killCount' of your character's database and print the item name and its value.
